DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Lantador's Lost Love
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: Prosperity
DivinationCards.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Journey
DivinationCards.flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

DivinationCards.name: The Spark and the Flame
DivinationCards.flavourText: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Wind
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:33>{Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.}

DivinationCards.name: The Catch
DivinationCards.flavourText: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

DivinationCards.name: Lantador's Lost Love
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

DivinationCards.name: Lysah's Respite
DivinationCards.flavourText:
So many memories,
so much pain in
such a small token.
Drown it in blood
so you can forget.

DivinationCards.name: Monochrome
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{"You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection." 
- Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist}

DivinationCards.name: Prosperity
DivinationCards.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

DivinationCards.name: The Avenger
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Justice comes swift 
Equal to the crime 
Revenge is a gift 
Life for a life 
Eye for an eye

DivinationCards.name: The Cache
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:23>{Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny
Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny
Secured within a chest 
or unearthed from your mining
Find jewellery everywhere, 
no need for divining!
So why is it so hard 
to figure out which one to wear?
This one makes me stronger, 
but does it match my hair?}

DivinationCards.name: The Emptiness
DivinationCards.flavourText: He appeared before the Light Eater, and at once knew his soul was damned.

DivinationCards.name: The Hoarder
DivinationCards.flavourText: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

DivinationCards.name: The Journey
DivinationCards.flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

DivinationCards.name: The Lover
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:26>{"I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."}

DivinationCards.name: The Siren
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:26>{At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.}

DivinationCards.name: The Leviathan
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{Ancient behemoths swam the
depths of the oceans long
before Man walked these lands.}

DivinationCards.name: The Wind
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:33>{Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.}

DivinationCards.name: The Catch
DivinationCards.flavourText: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

DivinationCards.name: The Craving
DivinationCards.flavourText: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

DivinationCards.name: The Lich
DivinationCards.flavourText: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

DivinationCards.name: The Mind's Eyes
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{Through the eyes of a person, 
you can see their soul
Through the eyes of a jewel, 
you can see the universe}

DivinationCards.name: Coveted Possession
DivinationCards.flavourText: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

DivinationCards.name: Grave Knowledge
DivinationCards.flavourText: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: The Celestial Justicar
DivinationCards.flavourText: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Forsaken
DivinationCards.flavourText: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Summoner
DivinationCards.flavourText: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Wretched
DivinationCards.flavourText: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

DivinationCards.name: The Rabbit's Foot
DivinationCards.flavourText: It is said anyone who bears this trinket is the luckiest exile in all of Wraeclast. The gods would disagree, and forever curse any whom give it away.

DivinationCards.name: Monochrome
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{"You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection." 
- Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist}

DivinationCards.name: Ambitious Obsession
DivinationCards.flavourText: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but no vision.

DivinationCards.name: More is Never Enough
DivinationCards.flavourText: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it

DivinationCards.name: The Bear Woman
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:24>{For the blessed bear in the cave,
A hundred days pass in silence and darkness,
until moon begins its fourth passage,
the bear sheds her beastly fur,
and is reborn, human and whole.}

DivinationCards.name: The Cacophony
DivinationCards.flavourText: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

DivinationCards.name: Brother's Stash
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Even though he found the stash just in time,
He would trade it all away and then some to have him back.

DivinationCards.name: Cursed Words
DivinationCards.flavourText: If you look hard enough for hidden meaning, you will find it.

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: Struck by Lightning
DivinationCards.flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

DivinationCards.name: The Coming Storm
DivinationCards.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The One With All
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:26>{Embrace death to honour the lost,
no fear in life no matter the cost. 
With one of all we are, 
and all of one we trust, 
throughout past, present and future... be just.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Union
DivinationCards.flavourText:
On the 21st of Eterni, 
two become one, 
their light outshines 
the setting sun.

DivinationCards.name: Man With Bear
DivinationCards.flavourText: A stereotypical joke may lead to an unexpected bond.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:30>{The artist is long dead,
the lyrics are long forgotten,
yet the Song of War longs to be sung again}

DivinationCards.name: Acclimatisation
DivinationCards.flavourText:
The world is ever-changing.
Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands,
Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters.
Adapt or perish.

DivinationCards.name: Baited Expectations
DivinationCards.flavourText: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

DivinationCards.name: Earth Drinker
DivinationCards.flavourText: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{No blade conquers sin;
guide a sinner to virtue,
unveil their lost sight‚Äî
your eyes, too, see in
everyone the inner child,
no matter their might.}

DivinationCards.name: The Twilight Moon
DivinationCards.flavourText: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

DivinationCards.name: The Twins
Wealth and Power
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.}

DivinationCards.name: Astral Protection
DivinationCards.flavourText:
For a time, we had something stronger than eldritch evil.
We had each other.

DivinationCards.name: Boundless Realms
DivinationCards.flavourText: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

DivinationCards.name: Dialla's Subjugation
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{A symbol of beauty and innocence
The gems corrupted her mind
Malachai corrupted her gems
All but a glimmer of
greatness lost in madness}

DivinationCards.name: Haunting Shadows
DivinationCards.flavourText:
In the dead of night you may elude your shadows,
but they will always find you by dawn.

DivinationCards.name: Heterochromia
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:26>{Black and White, Silver and Gold
Let us see the world Unfold
Red and Blue, Yellow and Green
Let us remake it in colours Unseen}

DivinationCards.name: Monochrome
DivinationCards.flavourText:

DivinationCards.name: The Opulent
DivinationCards.flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

DivinationCards.name: The Sun
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.}

DivinationCards.name: The Twins
A Dab of Ink
DivinationCards.flavourText: The Poet's blood is the Empire's ink.

DivinationCards.name: Blind Venture
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own."
- Klayver, the Antiquarian

DivinationCards.name: Costly Curio
DivinationCards.flavourText: "Oh no, I couldn't possibly afford this fine artefact. I'm... just looking."

DivinationCards.name: Destined to Crumble
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:30>{"Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us:
Nothing is eternal."
- Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar}

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source. 
Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.}

DivinationCards.name: Checkmate
DivinationCards.flavourText: When victory is impossible, each of us plays only to delay the end.

DivinationCards.flavourText: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

DivinationCards.name: The Incantation
DivinationCards.flavourText: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

DivinationCards.name: The Witch
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:27>{A wanderer in the wild strives 
Against countless foes he survives 
A fool pursues a quest contrived 
By the gift of the witch, alive.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: A humble piece of wood offers the simplest solution to life's problems: just hit them really, really hard.

through the gate;
they carry a protective ward.
A faction conspires
against their fate,
but magic unravels the sword.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

DivinationCards.flavourText:

- Malachai, on Maligaro

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{Shrieking souls locked away 
Hate splits frozen cells asunder 
The knot of corruption
undone at last}

DivinationCards.name: The Wilted Rose
DivinationCards.flavourText: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

DivinationCards.flavourText:

lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

flesh like coal, try to crush me,
diamond is what remains.}

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Jeweller's Boon
DivinationCards.flavourText: The jeweller's true talent is the capacity to see a jewel's beauty before they draw it out.

DivinationCards.name: The Primordial
DivinationCards.flavourText:
We play at God with our necromancy, 
but forces far more potent 
sleep within these stones.

DivinationCards.name: The Rite of Elements
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{A mind as quick as lightning, 
fists as hard as stone, 
a heart that burns with fury, 
and eyes that chill to the bone.}

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Watcher
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:31>{Strange eyes on top of spines 
Gaze beyond the veil of time 
Deep down below the mines 
A dream of crimson and of grime}

DivinationCards.name: The Wolf
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:29>{The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.}

DivinationCards.name: Time-Lost Relic
DivinationCards.flavourText: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

DivinationCards.name: Treasure Hunter
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words

DivinationCards.name: Volatile Power
DivinationCards.flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

DivinationCards.name: A Stone Perfected
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.}

DivinationCards.name: Bijoux
DivinationCards.flavourText: "Such fine trinkets show their true value in times of crisis." - Tangmazu

DivinationCards.name: The Shepherd's Sandals
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:30>{He who watches the flock is himself watched by those with loyalty beyond measure.}

DivinationCards.name: Terrible Secret of Space
DivinationCards.flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

DivinationCards.name: The Mind's Eyes
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{Through the eyes of a person, 
you can see their soul
Through the eyes of a jewel, 
you can see the universe}

DivinationCards.name: Dying Anguish
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:29>{Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.}

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Jack in the Box
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Turn the crank, 
close your eyes, 
and pray to the gods 
for a pleasant surprise.

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,

beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.flavourText: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.}

- Laszlo, the Scourge

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{"Fate was always my nemesis... 
But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now."
- Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted}

DivinationCards.flavourText:
By the time their eyes meet, 
the dark deal has long since been made,

Their love grew stronger
with every breath,

DivinationCards.flavourText: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

that snow blanketed the land,
but in truth, all their chickens
had come home to roost.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: The harvest ended, the floods began.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
So many memories,
so much pain in
such a small token.
Drown it in blood
so you can forget.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
Justice comes swift 
Equal to the crime 
Revenge is a gift 
Life for a life 
Eye for an eye

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:23>{Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny
Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny
Secured within a chest 
or unearthed from your mining
Find jewellery everywhere, 
no need for divining!
So why is it so hard 
to figure out which one to wear?
This one makes me stronger, 
but does it match my hair?}

For us all 
To help us through 
The perils told.

her beauty unparalleled;
Divine.}

<size:30>{A weapon, a shelter, a prison.
The web's purpose changes
with the spider's needs.
A lesson we should
take to heart.}

DivinationCards.name: Assassin's Favour
DivinationCards.flavourText:
By the time their eyes meet, 
the dark deal has long since been made, 
and his fate long since sealed.

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: The Blazing Fire
DivinationCards.flavourText: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Journalist
DivinationCards.flavourText: A good spy doesn't forget she's gone undercover.

DivinationCards.name: The Life Thief
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"The process of eternal youth is a give and take. You give them death and take their youth."
- Zerphi of the Vaal

DivinationCards.name: The Poet
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:27>{God had forsaken the land 
And Victario wept.
Corruption consumed the land 
And Victario's tears turned to blood.}

DivinationCards.name: The Saint's Treasure
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.}

DivinationCards.name: The Side Quest
DivinationCards.flavourText: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: Home
DivinationCards.flavourText: There are countless people, countless stories, and countless eras, but there is one place that, for a time, each of us loved and was loved. It matters. We matter.

DivinationCards.name: Terrible Secret of Space
DivinationCards.flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

DivinationCards.name: A Note in the Wind
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:30>{The artist is long dead,
the lyrics are long forgotten,
yet the Song of War longs to be sung again}

DivinationCards.name: Acclimatisation
DivinationCards.flavourText:
The world is ever-changing.
Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands,
Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters.
Adapt or perish.

DivinationCards.name: Baited Expectations
DivinationCards.flavourText: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

DivinationCards.name: Earth Drinker
DivinationCards.flavourText: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

DivinationCards.flavourText:

lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Imperial Legacy
DivinationCards.flavourText: A life lost, A legacy born.

DivinationCards.flavourText: A king's movement is unwavering.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:24>{Dread and danger 
makes the air feel thin. 
Above, power slumbers, tempting fate. 
Greed and ambition 
draws countless in, 
For those who seek power 
can never wait.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: Without the ability to weep, the heart hardens against both the pure and the corrupt.

DivinationCards.flavourText: If enough people believe something to be true, whether or not it is becomes irrelevant.

DivinationCards.name: Lantador's Lost Love
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: Prosperity
DivinationCards.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

DivinationCards.name: Scholar of the Seas
DivinationCards.flavourText: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

DivinationCards.name: The Deep Ones
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{"The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"}

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Formless Sea
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Formless might,
Wild beauty tamed,
The brine of gods,
The seas restrained.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Journey
DivinationCards.flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

DivinationCards.name: The Primordial
DivinationCards.flavourText:
We play at God with our necromancy, 
but forces far more potent 
sleep within these stones.

DivinationCards.name: The Rite of Elements
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{A mind as quick as lightning, 
fists as hard as stone, 
a heart that burns with fury, 
and eyes that chill to the bone.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Catch
DivinationCards.flavourText: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

DivinationCards.name: A Stone Perfected
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.}

DivinationCards.name: From Bone to Ashes
DivinationCards.flavourText: For centuries, they stood vigil in secret over their sleeping goddess, even as contamination oozed out of the decadent Vaal empire.

DivinationCards.flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
"How many lives have you consumed?" 
"How many times have you blinked?"

DivinationCards.name: The Insatiable
DivinationCards.flavourText: A lust for souls. The urge to kill just to satisfy its thirst. An unbearable burden that would make even the purest heart blacken over time.

DivinationCards.name: The Nurse
DivinationCards.flavourText: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

DivinationCards.name: The Oath
DivinationCards.flavourText: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

DivinationCards.name: The Surveyor
DivinationCards.flavourText: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

DivinationCards.flavourText: The threads of fate are the strongest ties.

DivinationCards.name: The Aesthete
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."
- Shavronne of Umbra

DivinationCards.name: The Offering
DivinationCards.flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

DivinationCards.name: Death
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:31>{The end of the old,
the beginning of the new.
A unique opportunity for transformation,
for those with the power
to grasp it.}

DivinationCards.flavourText:
Even though he found the stash just in time,
He would trade it all away and then some to have him back.

DivinationCards.flavourText: If you look hard enough for hidden meaning, you will find it.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

DivinationCards.name: The Coming Storm
DivinationCards.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:26>{Embrace death to honour the lost,
no fear in life no matter the cost. 
With one of all we are, 
and all of one we trust, 
throughout past, present and future... be just.}

DivinationCards.name: The Union
DivinationCards.flavourText:
On the 21st of Eterni, 
two become one, 
their light outshines 
the setting sun.

DivinationCards.name: Three Voices
DivinationCards.flavourText: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

DivinationCards.name: Bowyer's Dream
DivinationCards.flavourText: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

DivinationCards.name: The Fletcher
DivinationCards.flavourText: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

DivinationCards.name: Boon of Justice
DivinationCards.flavourText: Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

DivinationCards.name: Brotherhood in Exile
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:25>{Seeking shelter from the night,
in the warmth of the run-down inn,
erstwhile foes put aside the fight,
to bond over whiskey and gin.}

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Gladiator
DivinationCards.flavourText:
The thumb turns down
and the crowd roars, 
they want death 
and the blood is yours.

DivinationCards.name: The King's Blade
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:25>{"To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."
- Daresso, the King of Swords}

DivinationCards.name: The Last One Standing
DivinationCards.flavourText: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

DivinationCards.name: The Sword King's Salute
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:26>{Many were slain by the sword king 
Their blood decorating his ring 
Those who retreated were slaughtered 
Those who fought bravely were honoured}

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: Unchained
DivinationCards.flavourText: Mold the world with your bare hands. Be careful, for what is your doing might become your undoing.

DivinationCards.name: The Arena Champion
DivinationCards.flavourText: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

DivinationCards.name: Azyran's Reward
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Method transcends shape and size. Do something in parallel long enough, and you will always find 
another way.

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: Struck by Lightning
DivinationCards.flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

DivinationCards.name: The Coming Storm
DivinationCards.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

For those who seek power 
can never wait.}

Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands,
Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters.
Adapt or perish.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,

beneath the harvest moon.

blood and bone,
a peaceful life
is one I can't condone."
- Tukohama, Father Of War

DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

you must shatter the world.

DivinationCards.flavourText:

lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

DivinationCards.flavourText:

makes the air feel thin. 
Above, power slumbers, tempting fate. 
Greed and ambition 
draws countless in, 
For those who seek power 
can never wait.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:25>{Cede all power and wealth to me and serve me in perpetuity.
A minor inconvenience I assure you.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: "Man may shape the world, but these? These shape the man." -Inquisitor Maligaro

DivinationCards.flavourText: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."
- Shavronne of Umbra

DivinationCards.flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:30>{Fear a man who is willing to sacrifice anything for power.}

DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Lord of Celebration
DivinationCards.flavourText: Though they were a pack of elite combatants, the Emperor's royal guards were not ready to face one of his notorious parties.

DivinationCards.name: The Opulent
DivinationCards.flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: Home
DivinationCards.flavourText: There are countless people, countless stories, and countless eras, but there is one place that, for a time, each of us loved and was loved. It matters. We matter.

DivinationCards.name: The Scavenger
DivinationCards.flavourText: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: The Chains that Bind
DivinationCards.flavourText: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

DivinationCards.name: The Dragon's Heart
DivinationCards.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Nurse
DivinationCards.flavourText: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

DivinationCards.name: The Penitent
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.}

DivinationCards.name: The Soul
DivinationCards.flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Warden
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.}

DivinationCards.name: The Dungeon Master
DivinationCards.flavourText: "So desperate was I for control, I turned my entire world into a prison. Now you will share in my agony."

DivinationCards.name: Harmony of Souls
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{Shrieking souls locked away 
Hate splits frozen cells asunder 
The knot of corruption
undone at last}

DivinationCards.name: The Aesthete
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."
- Shavronne of Umbra

DivinationCards.name: The Offering
DivinationCards.flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

DivinationCards.name: Buried Treasure
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{You can't seek riches without getting your hands dirty.}

DivinationCards.name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Our Lady Dialla,
as a symbol of our progress,
shines greater than all the gems.

DivinationCards.name: Glimmer of Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.name: Hope
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
DivinationCards.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

DivinationCards.name: The Endurance
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,
flowing through my veins,
flesh like coal, try to crush me,
diamond is what remains.}

DivinationCards.name: The Fathomless Depths
DivinationCards.flavourText: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Primordial
DivinationCards.flavourText:
We play at God with our necromancy, 
but forces far more potent 
sleep within these stones.

DivinationCards.name: The Rite of Elements
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:29>{A mind as quick as lightning, 
fists as hard as stone, 
a heart that burns with fury, 
and eyes that chill to the bone.}

DivinationCards.name: The Survivalist
DivinationCards.flavourText:
A lucky number 
For us all 
To help us through 
The perils told.

DivinationCards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: The Trial
DivinationCards.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

DivinationCards.name: The Wolf
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:29>{The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.}

DivinationCards.name: Time-Lost Relic
DivinationCards.flavourText: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

DivinationCards.name: Treasure Hunter
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words

DivinationCards.name: Volatile Power
DivinationCards.flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

DivinationCards.name: A Stone Perfected
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:28>{They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.}

DivinationCards.name: Bijoux
DivinationCards.flavourText: "Such fine trinkets show their true value in times of crisis." - Tangmazu

DivinationCards.name: Terrible Secret of Space
DivinationCards.flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

DivinationCards.name: The Mind's Eyes
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:28>{Through the eyes of a person, 
you can see their soul
Through the eyes of a jewel, 
you can see the universe}

DivinationCards.name: Her Mask
DivinationCards.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

DivinationCards.name: Lantador's Lost Love
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

DivinationCards.name: Lingering Remnants
DivinationCards.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

DivinationCards.name: Lucky Connections
DivinationCards.flavourText: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

DivinationCards.name: Prosperity
DivinationCards.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

DivinationCards.name: Struck by Lightning
DivinationCards.flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

DivinationCards.name: The Coming Storm
DivinationCards.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

DivinationCards.name: The Journey
DivinationCards.flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

DivinationCards.name: The Old Man
DivinationCards.flavourText: Hear me, fish! I love and respect you, but before this day ends I will kill you dead.

DivinationCards.name: The Pact
DivinationCards.flavourText: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

DivinationCards.flavourText: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

DivinationCards.name: Thunderous Skies
DivinationCards.flavourText: <size:30>{Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.}

DivinationCards.name: Rain of Chaos
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night 
Chaos reigned 
Where the shards fell 
All was destroyed 
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}

DivinationCards.name: The Fox
DivinationCards.flavourText:
"Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb

DivinationCards.name: The Gambler
DivinationCards.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

DivinationCards.name: The Harvester
DivinationCards.flavourText:
<size:30>{Taste not of their
forbidden fruit.
Theirs is a harvest of
the darkest kind,
twisted, rotten and
damned for eternity.}

DivinationCards.name: The Scarred Meadow
DivinationCards.flavourText: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

DivinationCards.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

DivinationCards.name: Tranquillity
DivinationCards.flavourText: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

DivinationCards.name: Ambitious Obsession
DivinationCards.flavourText: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but no vision.

DivinationCards.name: More is Never Enough
DivinationCards.flavourText: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it
